statusLine.command: input=$(cat); branch=$(git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); if [ -n "$remaining" ]; then printf "%s | %s | Context: %.0f%% remaining" "$branch" "$model" "$remaining"; else printf "%s | %s" "$branch" "$model"; fi
